BadgeDetail.Name: Sports Mentor
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to be an effective mentor through supporting the academic development of the skills and knowledge of a peer.

Task.Title: The 5 minute video
Task.Body: Upload a 5 minute video of you supporting a peer in their development, as well as any supporting evidence such as proof reading work, revision notes etc.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a 5 minute video of you supporting a peer in their development, as well as any supporting evidence such as proof reading work, revision notes etc.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a 5 minute video of you supporting a peer in their development, as well as any supporting evidence such as proof reading work, revision notes etc.
